pro: a society without gender is a pretty good idea.
there is no need to distinguish between men and women.
con: a society without gender is a really bad idea.

intro: Let's discuss a society without gender!
prompt: I more or less agree with what my peers are saying here. Regarding the idea of a society without gender, I'd just add the following thought:

initial_posts.text: The absence of gender constructions would enable people to enjoy a better overall quality of life. I think a society without gender is a pretty good idea.

Then, instead of conforming to the norms to the point it negatively impacts their life, they can get better at what will help them succeed. I think there is no need to distinguish between men and women.
